documentContentReferences.name: End of Study Definition
documentContentReferences.description: Revised to include Post-Trial Access (PTA) program information.

documentContentReferences.name: AE Management Reference
documentContentReferences.description: Table 6-8 updated to include Hemophagocytic lymphohistiocytosis (HLH) reference.

documentContentReferences.name: Pneumonitis Guidelines
documentContentReferences.description: Clarification of mandatory dose modifications and clinical management for pneumonitis.

documentContentReferences.name: Amylase/Lipase Management
documentContentReferences.description: Updated for PDR001 resumption at 2nd occurrence of grade 4 asymptomatic amylase/lipase.

documentContentReferences.name: Imaging Assessment Plan
documentContentReferences.description: Updated to include public health emergency disruption proofing language.

documentContentReferences.name: Statistical Assumptions
documentContentReferences.description: Reference for statistical analysis and assumptions regarding delayed treatment effect.

documentContentReferences.name: RECIST Appendix
documentContentReferences.description: Detailed efficacy assessment and definitions using RECIST 1.1 criteria.

commentAnnotations.text: For asymptomatic amylase and/or lipase elevations refer to Table 6-18
Placebo administrations to those patients randomized to the placebo arm will discontinue while dabrafenib and trametinib may continue for the same patients
The changes herein affect the Informed Consent. Sites are required to update and submit for approval a revised Informed Consent.
Language was updated to align with the latest Novartis protocol template (OneCTP version 5.0).

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Revised end of study definition for PTA, updated HLH safety info, and added public health emergency mitigation.
Enabled continuation following final PFS analysis to characterize OS benefit; mandatory unblinding.
Adjusted timing of final PFS analysis and included interim PFS analysis based on delayed treatment effect.
Aligned contraception requirements with IB updates and updated GDPR personal data definitions.
